name: MEC Heritage Rain Hat - Children
categories: Toddler and child hats and toques
description:
This kids' rain hat is a practical way to get full coverage when it's bucketing. A short brim protects their face but doesn't interfere with their ability to see the playground or trail.Made of MEC's durable 200-denier heritage nylon, with a polyurethane coating and a Durable Water Repellent finish.Fully seam sealed for waterproofness.Extended back brim keeps runoff from getting inside clothing.Chin strap with "no-scratch" hook-and-loop closure.Name label on the inside helps make those games of “whose is whose” a bit easier.Reflective details for heightened visibility.

        Sustainability
